ValidationRule.description: D&O Supplemental Coverage Adjusted Rate cannot be lower than 80% of base rate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND( CONTAINS( Coverages__c , "Directors & Officers"), D_O_Base_Rate__c * 0.80 > D_O_Supplemental_Coverage_Adjusted_Rate__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Directors and Officers Supplemental Coverage Adjusted Rate cannot be lower than 80% of base rate. Please update your inputs to stay above the minimum premium.
